data.name: Brick-Force: Navy Soldier DLC
data.detailed_description:
Gear up and be part of the ultimate elite: the Navy SEALs! With top-notch gear and weapons, the Navy Soldier Pack allows you to dominate your enemies like a real pro!
Blend in with the environment with your Navy fatigues, sneak up on enemies, and get rid of them before they even know you were there.

Every SEAL loves their weapon, so take good care of your beloved assault rifle by upgrading it with those included Elite Weapon Gems!
data.about_the_game:
Gear up and be part of the ultimate elite: the Navy SEALs! With top-notch gear and weapons, the Navy Soldier Pack allows you to dominate your enemies like a real pro!
Blend in with the environment with your Navy fatigues, sneak up on enemies, and get rid of them before they even know you were there.

Every SEAL loves their weapon, so take good care of your beloved assault rifle by upgrading it with those included Elite Weapon Gems!
data.short_description: Join the elite of the elite and feel like a real covert operator with the Navy Soldier Pack - just don't whine when you get your anchor tattoo!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon™ II X2 255 / Intel Pentium E5500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon ™ HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
